locations: Miami, New York, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: Mouthpiece hits the road and holds auditions in both Miami and Los Angeles, The Road to the Dunk League, to find the next crop of dunkers worthy enough for dunk league. In each city he'll put hopefuls through 3 challenges that will test their creativity, power, accuracy and ability to perform under pressure. At the end, it'll be Mouthpiece's sole discretion on who gets a ticket to the big show. After a nationwide search, the 10 best dunkers in the world descend on basketball's mecca, NYC where they'll battle in 16 competitions, each worth $1000 cash. The last remaining two will square off for $50,000 grand prize and the title of Dunk League Champion.
imdb.title: Dunk League Vol. 2
plot: Mouthpiece hits the road and holds auditions in both Miami and Los Angeles, The Road to the Dunk League, to find the next crop of dunkers worthy enough for dunk league.
